info.description:
Let There Be Light
The bulb faces inwards and reflects off the gold foil lining the shade, creating a broad and warm illuminating effect.

Classic Touch
The metal frame is painted in antique copper to give it a classic feel. And the gold foil is intricately fitted by hand.

Get Illuminated
The perfect way to light up your look in style - whether you're after an industrial edge or a more vintage feel.

Product Details.Finish:
Frame - antique copper
Shade - gold foil (inside)

Product Details.Bulb: Requires max 40W E27 bulb - not included

Box 2 - 112 x 19 x 17cm
